chime.title: Preparation
chime.explanation:
Byron DB buttons and chimes use many different identification codes. But Homey does not yet know which one is used.

Make sure the chime is paired with the button. This process is described in the manual of the chime.

Press the button now to let Homey know the identification of the chime. Nothing will be indicated on this screen.

button.title: Preparation
button.explanation:
Byron DB buttons and chimes use many different identification codes. But Homey does not yet know which one is used.

Press the button now to let Homey know the identification of the button. Nothing will be indicated on this screen.
